issue.title: [C++] Add ExecNode to arrow/compute/api.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15263](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15263). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current, if I want to do anything with exec plans I have to have:

```Java

#include <arrow/compute/exec/exec_plan.h>
```

This should not be required if I already have:

```Java

#include <arrow/compute/api.h>
```

Note, when ARROW-15238 is finished the correct file might be something like `arrow/engine/api.h` instead of `arrow/compute/api.h`
